pullrequest.title: posterior compatibility with sublabel output mode

content.raw: Also in case it was forgotten, as per the discussion earlier in the pull request, an issue should be raised for the case of "num-sublabels=0" as it gives a divide-by-zero error. It would be great if you included the steps to reproduce this error on the current version of segway.
content.html: Also in case it was forgotten, as per the discussion earlier in the pull request, an issue should be raised for the case of "num-sublabels=0" as it gives a divide-by-zero error. It would be great if you included the steps to reproduce this error on the current version of segway.
